GSD.product_version: versions from v6.0 to before v6.0.3
GSD.description:
ext4: fix check for block being out of directory size

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 9a62667d1640890a96e31dc71d4011f4f28f912f, it was introduced in version v6.0 by commit 65f8ea4cd57dbd46ea13b41dc8bac03176b04233. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ext4: fix check for block being out of directory size
